title: Could Trump end Juneteenth as a federal holiday? Not on his own
shortDescription: Juneteenth was named a federal holiday by former President Joe Biden in 2021.

title: Trump to delay TikTok ban for the third time with 90-day extension
shortDescription: President Trump plans to extend a ban on TikTok for the third time, giving parent company, ByteDance, another 90 days to divest its U.S. assets.

title: What's next for Trump's big tax bill in the Senate
shortDescription: After weeks of negotiations, it's unclear whether Republican senators are any closer to finding the votes to approve the package.

title: Judge blocks Trump anti-trans passport policy
shortDescription: A federal judge blocked the Trump administration from refusing to issue passports to transgender Americans that reflect their gender identities.

title: Primary lessons: Trump rules, Dems are revved. NYC's melee is next.
shortDescription: Off-year elections are the tea leaves of U.S. politics, and just as reliable. Still, here are clues from 2025 contests in Virginia and New Jersey.

title: RFK Jr. faces blowback after vaccine committee firings
shortDescription: Twenty two senators wrote a joint letter to Kennedy saying they are “troubled” by the new appointments

title: Trump promete proteger a migrantes… y ordena más deportaciones
shortDescription: Trump promete proteger a trabajadores migrantes esenciales, pero al mismo tiempo ordena la mayor ola de deportaciones en ciudades latinas de EE. UU.

title: Senate passes crypto legislation with bipartisan support
shortDescription: The bill to regulate stablecoins represents a win for the cryptocurrency industry. A House vote is next before President Trump can sign it into law.

title: Trump threatens Iran's supreme leader
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threatened Iran's supreme leader with assassination as he pushed Tehran to end its retaliatory airstrikes on Israel.

title: Trump reverses course on ICE raids at farms, hotels, restaurants
shortDescription: President Trump had promised changes to protect some migrant workers in a June 12 Truth Social post but his administration has since changed course.

title: GOP senator deletes controversial posts on Minnesota lawmaker death
shortDescription: Sen. Mike Lee deleted his controversial social media posts on the assassination of a Minnesota Democratic state lawmaker after facing backlash.

title: In Trump's Oval Office, MLK Jr. bust replaced with Winston Churchill
shortDescription: President Barack Obama moved the Martin Luther King Jr. bust into the Oval Office in 2009. Trump kept it during his first term but now it's gone.

title: Trump: US knows where Iran's supreme leader is, won't kill him 'for now'
shortDescription: Trump says US won't kill Iran's supreme leader, 'at least not for now'

title: MTG, Tucker Carlson urge Trump to stay out of Iran as MAGA rift grows
shortDescription: Some of President Donald Trump's top MAGA supporters are urging him not to join the Middle East conflict.

title: Appeals court questions judges' ability to review Trump's LA National Guard deployment
shortDescription: The three-judge panel quizzed lawyers from the Justice Department and California on whether they should factor into Trump's decision at all.

title: "We now have complete.., control of the skies over Iran" Trump says
shortDescription: Trump indicates US involved in Israeli attacks on Iran in social media post. "We now have complete and total control of the skies over Iran."

title: Why did Trump leave the G7? What to know about Israel and Iran
shortDescription: President Donald Trump departed the G7 summit early. Why? Because a 5-day conflict between Iran and Israel is deepening. Trump went to Situation Room
